pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package enables one to run VPython in a browser, using the GlowScript VPython API, documented in the Help at http://glowscript.org. If the code is in a cell in a Jupyter notebook, the 3D scene appears in the Jupyter notebook. If the code is launched outside a notebook (e.g. from the command line), a browser window will open displaying the scene.
